pma:database.name: bear
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `machine` ( `Adresse_Mac` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `RAM` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Nom_Machine` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Temps_Actif` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Processeur` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Espace_Disque_Dispo` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `RAM_Dispo` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Espace_Disque` varchar(200) NOT NULL, `Date` varchar(200) NOT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
